#include<stdio.h>
int arr[1000001] ;
 long long int b[1000001] ;
int main(){

	int i,j ;

	for(i=0;i<=1000000;i++)
		arr[i] = -1 ;

	arr[0] = 0 ;
	arr[1] = 0 ;
	b[0] = 0 ;
	b[1] = 1 ;
	long long int p = 0 ;
	for(i=2;i<=1000000;i++){
		
		b[i] = p ;

		if(arr[i] == -1){
			p+=i ;
			arr[i] = i ;
			for(j=i+i;j<=1000000;j+=i){
			
			
				arr[j] = 0 ;
			}
		
		}
	}

	int n , t;
	scanf("%d",&t) ;

	while(t--){

		
		scanf("%d",&n) ;
	
		printf("%llu\n",b[n]) ;
	}
	
	return(0) ;
}
